name: bounce (itch) (zodiepupper)
description:
A simple game I made to get more practice with various godot systems. Supports controller, touch, mouse, and keyboard! I developed this entirely on my SteamDeck, so it will be a bit before I can fix the icon and test the windows build.

Please consider supporting so I can continue to make more games and hopefully better ones too.

I created some of the icons, some of them are from packs made by Zacksly, so check out their stuff, it's very nice.

The nice background is:
https://opengameart.org/content/mountain-at-dusk-background

I'll be working to add more polish, modes, features, etc. soon hopefully. I do want to add some sounds to this one. I enjoyed making this one, and I look forward to making more things.
